doc.previous: The invariant magnitude of the momentum 4 vector generates the energy momentum relation
doc.after: We can work out what this invariant is by first arguing that since it is a scalar it doesn t matter in which reference frame we calculate it and then by transforming to a frame where the total momentum is zero
